purchasedCourses.title: React Fundamentals
purchasedCourses.description: Master the fundamentals of React with hands-on projects. Learn JSX, components, state management, hooks, and build real-world applications. Perfect for beginners starting their React journey.

purchasedCourses.title: Advanced TypeScript
purchasedCourses.description: Deep dive into advanced TypeScript concepts including generics, decorators, utility types, and advanced patterns. Learn to write more robust and maintainable code.

purchasedCourses.title: UI/UX Design Principles
purchasedCourses.description: Learn essential UI/UX design principles, user research methods, wireframing, prototyping, and usability testing. Create user-centered designs that solve real problems.

purchasedCourses.title: Python for Data Science
purchasedCourses.description: Comprehensive introduction to Python for data science. Cover pandas, numpy, matplotlib, seaborn, and machine learning basics. Work with real datasets and build predictive models.

purchasedCourses.title: Git & GitHub Mastery
purchasedCourses.description: Master Git version control and GitHub collaboration. Learn branching strategies, resolving conflicts, pull requests, and best practices for team development workflows.

purchasedCourses.title: CSS Grid & Flexbox
purchasedCourses.description: Master modern CSS layout techniques with Grid and Flexbox. Learn to create responsive, complex layouts without relying on frameworks. Build real-world projects.

purchasedCourses.title: JavaScript ES6+ Features
purchasedCourses.description: Explore modern JavaScript features including arrow functions, destructuring, modules, async/await, and more. Write cleaner, more maintainable JavaScript code.

purchasedCourses.title: Responsive Web Design
purchasedCourses.description: Learn to create websites that work perfectly on all devices. Master responsive design principles, mobile-first approach, and CSS media queries for optimal user experience.

purchasedCourses.title: SQL Database Fundamentals
purchasedCourses.description: Master SQL fundamentals including queries, joins, subqueries, and database design. Learn to work with real databases and write efficient, optimized SQL statements.

purchasedCourses.title: Web Accessibility
purchasedCourses.description: Learn to create accessible web applications that work for everyone. Cover WCAG guidelines, semantic HTML, ARIA attributes, and testing tools for inclusive design.

availableCourses.title: Node.js Backend Development
availableCourses.description: Build scalable backend applications with Node.js. Learn Express.js, REST APIs, authentication, database integration, and deployment strategies for production applications.

availableCourses.title: Machine Learning Basics
availableCourses.description: Introduction to machine learning algorithms and techniques. Cover supervised/unsupervised learning, neural networks, and practical applications using Python and popular ML libraries.

availableCourses.title: Mobile App Development with React Native
availableCourses.description: Build cross-platform mobile apps with React Native. Learn navigation, state management, native modules, and deploy to both iOS and Android app stores.

availableCourses.title: DevOps Fundamentals
availableCourses.description: Learn DevOps practices including CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud deployment. Automate your development workflow and improve deployment reliability.

availableCourses.title: Web Security Essentials
availableCourses.description: Master web security fundamentals including OWASP Top 10, authentication, authorization, data protection, and security testing. Build secure web applications from the ground up.
